recipesJson.name: Mr. Nice guy
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description: Custard cookie coconut what's not to love here. FLV smooth can be left out if you don't have it. But it really does pump up the vanilla so if you're ever Nila lover like myself this is a must-have.

reviews.text: This was a pretty freaking good custard. The cookie is light, not overpowering with a great vanilla custard taste. The pairing of the two custards give it a good thick mouthfeel without VC1 taking over and drowning everything out. I didn't get much coconut out of this, even using Macaroon at the 2% it was very faint to where I had to search for it. It could be because I let it steep quite a bit longer than 5 days. I was still very pleased with this, and have made a little more. I personally added .25% FA - Coconut just to bump the coconut up a little and have the creamieness meld well with the custards.
